name: T-Rekt
description:
ONLY WORKS IN FIREFOX!

DESCRIPTION
Save the T-Rekt and its species from the meteor shower!

CONTROLS
- "a, d" or arrow keys for movement.
- You will breed new members each 5 levels.

CREDITS
This is a project made by students for the joy and knowledge about making better games.
- Artist & Programmer: Manuel Rodríguez Matesanz.
- CEO: Diego C. Torguet. (@DiegoCTorguet)
- Producer & Designer: Antonio Bastos Córdoba. (@antonio10bc)
- Logo: Marta Aguiló.

We used:
"At The Shore", "Digya"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
